body:
Ok so here's how this will go. Comment down a Would You Rather, and the person under will answer. Then they'll comment a new Would You Rather and the cycle repeats.

Make Sure It's appropriate.
body_tagged:
Ok so here's how this will go. Comment down a Would You Rather, and the person under will answer. Then they'll comment a new Would You Rather and the cycle repeats.

Make Sure It's appropriate.
title: Would You Rather?

replies.body: Would you rather get stung by a bee, or bitten by a spider?

replies.body:
Stung by a bee because it doesn't really hurt

replies.body: Would you rather always have a clown face or always wear clown clothes?
replies.body_tagged: Would you rather always have a clown face or always wear clown clothes?

replies.body:
For the first one sneeze because it feels good
Second is wear clown clothes, because people won't think you are a maniac if you just wear the clothes, just imagine what it would look like when someone with a clown face puts on an expensive suit? lol

replies.body: Would you rather eat a roach or spider?
replies.body_tagged: Would you rather eat a roach or spider?

replies.body:
Roach, definitely. It would be better cooked, but I think it's more feasible to eat than a spider even if alive.

Would you rather freeze to death, or burn to death?
replies.body_tagged:
Roach, definitely. It would be better cooked, but I think it's more feasible to eat than a spider even if alive.

Would you rather freeze to death, or burn to death?

Burn. Freezing is a slower death then burning.

Freeze to death, because it would numb your senses, while burning, well, burns.
